Service Details: Provides BCID cards for non-drivers which are typically used as identification in any situation where a driver's licence would be used
Eligibility: To get a BCID card, you must be 12 or older * those under 19 must get consent from a parent or legal guardian, and will have to be accompanied by parent or guardian to the driver licensing office
How to Apply: To submit your application, bring 2 pieces of required ID, one primary and one secondary to the Driver Licensing Office * for a full ist of primary ID, please visit our website
Address & Map: 1720 Springfield RdKelowna, BC     V1Y 7W2View MapQuest Map
